author: ekoneil
msg: - back out the change to EventSet handling that added events from the parent event set to the list of event methods.  Ultimately, this ended up duplicating a bunch of code throughout the inheritance hierarchy.  There is still a problem here where methods declared in @EventSet(s) throughout the entire hierarchy need to be added to the ClientInitializer's event adaptor, but this needs to be fixed in another way.

- use a fully qualified class name to register an event callback in the generated control bean.  When a control declares an event set that is declared in the control's parent class and the two share a name, this reference is ambiguous.
